Text.Page:
Krakatox turned one of his own bones into this weapon.

It's still pulsing with powerful energy, even though its owner is dead.

The legendary Blacksmith Muhrak might know how to make use of the weapon's energy.

- Krakatox's Weapon vanishes when you accept this quest.
Wow, this powerful energy! Where did you find this? <PCNAME>, give me a moment. Maybe I can make a new weapon with it.
